name: @natlibfi/melinda-record-match-validator
description: Validates if two records matched by melinda-record-matching can be merged and sets merge priority
author: The National Library of Finland

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:base

oldScripts.test:dev: npm run lint:dev && DEBUG='@natlibfi/*' npm run test:base -- --recursive test && npm run coverage
oldScripts.test:dev:collect: npm run lint:dev && DEBUG='@natlibfi/*' npm run test:base -- test/collectRecordValues.spec.js && npm run coverage
oldScripts.test:dev:compare: npm run lint:dev && DEBUG='@natlibfi/*' npm run test:base -- test/compareRecordValues.spec.js && npm run coverage
oldScripts.watch:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nodemon -w src -w test-fixtures --exec 'npm run test:dev'
